JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Order History Line
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
col.order_no as OrderNumber,
0 + col.line_no as LineNumber,
0 + col.rel_no as ReleaseNumber,
co.customer_no as CustomerNumber,
col.ship_addr_no as CustomerSequence,
col.catalog_no as ProductNumber,
col.catalog_desc as Description,
col.sales_unit_meas as UOM,
col.note_text as Notes,
col.desired_qty as QtyOrdered,
col.qty_shipped as QtyShipped,
col.sale_unit_price as UnitPrice,
col.desired_qty * col.sale_unit_price as LineTotal,
col.real_ship_date as ShipDate,
co.contract as Warehouse,
col.state as Status
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer_order co join
customer_order_line col on co.order_no = col.order_no
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
co.company = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany} and 
co.objversion > to_char(sysdate -5,'YYYYMMDD')
UNION SELECT
coc.order_no as OrderNumber,
1000 + coc.sequence_no as LineNumber,
0 as ReleaseNumber,
co2.customer_no as CustomerNumber,
co2.ship_addr_no as CustomerSequence,
coc.charge_type as ProductNumber,
sct.charge_type_desc as Description,
coc.sales_unit_meas as UOM,
'' as Notes,
coc.charged_qty as QtyOrdered,
coc.charged_qty as QtyShipped,
coc.charge_amount as UnitPrice,
coc.charge_amount as LineTotal,
coc.date_entered as ShipDate,
coc.contract as Warehouse,
'' as Status
from customer_order_charge coc join
customer_order co2 on co2.order_no = coc.order_no left join
sales_charge_type sct on sct.contract = coc.contract and sct.charge_type = coc.charge_type
where
co2.company = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany} and 
co2.objversion > to_char(sysdate -5,'YYYYMMDD')

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Order Header
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
co.order_no as OrderNumber,
co.state as Status,
co.date_entered as OrderDate,
co.order_id as OrderType,
co.customer_no as CustomerNumber,
co.ship_addr_no as ShipToNumber,
co.customer_po_no as CustomerPO,
co.pay_term_id as TermsCode,
co.currency_code as CurrencyCode,
co.ship_via_code as ShipVia,
co.wanted_delivery_date as RequestedDeliveryDate,
co.salesman_code as Salesperson,
co.note_text as Notes,
ci.name as BTCompanyName,
cia.Address1 as BTAddress1,
cia.Address2 as BTAddress2,
cia.City as BTCity,
cia.State as BTState,
cia.Country_db as BTCountry,
cia.zip_code as BTPostalCode,
coa2.addr_1 as STCompanyName,
coa2.address1 as STAddress1,
coa2.address2 as STAddress2,
coa2.city as STCity,
coa2.state as STState,
coa2.zip_code as STPostalCode,
coa2.country_code as STCountry,
(select sum(desired_qty * sale_unit_price) from customer_order_line where order_no = co.order_no) as ProductTotal,
(select sum(desired_qty * (unit_price_incl_tax - sale_unit_price)) from customer_order_line where order_no = co.order_no) as TaxTotal,
(select sum(desired_qty * unit_price_incl_tax) from customer_order_line where order_no = co.order_no) as OrderTotal
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer_order co
join customer_info_address cia on cia.customer_id = co.customer_no and cia.address_id = co.bill_addr_no
join customer_info ci on ci.customer_id = cia.customer_id
join customer_order_address_2 coa2 on coa2.order_no = co.order_no

Name: IFS Setup - Payment Terms
Description: Optional job to run on demand to create payment terms

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Payment Terms
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
pay_term_id as TermsCode,
Description,
current_date as ActivateOn

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Product CrossSell
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
parent_part_no as PartNumber,
suggested_part_no as RelatedPartNumber,
'ProductRelationship' as ListType,
'CrossSell' as ListValue
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
suggested_sales_part ssp join 
sales_part sp1 on sp1.part_no = ssp.parent_part_no join
sales_part sp2 on sp2.part_no = ssp.suggested_part_no
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
ssp.contract = {IntegrationConnector_IfsDefaultSite} and
sp1.activeind_db = 'Y' and sp1.catalog_type_db =  'INV' and
sp2.activeind_db = 'Y' and sp2.catalog_type_db =  'INV'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Invoice History Line
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
i.invoice_no as InvoiceNumber,
it.item_id as LineNumber,
0 as ReleaseNumber,
it.order_no as OrderNumber,
it.line_no as OrderLine,
it.release_no as OrderRelease,
it.catalog_no as ProductNumber,
it.description as Description,
it.sale_um as UM,
it.invoiced_qty as QtyInvoiced,
it.net_curr_amount as LineTotal,
round(it.net_curr_amount / it.invoiced_qty,3) as ItemPrice
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
cust_order_inv_item_uiv_all it join
invoice i on i.company = it.company and i.invoice_id = it.invoice_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
i.company  = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany}  and
i.party_type_db = 'CUSTOMER' and
i.bi_timestamp > sysdate - 5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Invoice Header
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
i.invoice_no as InvoiceNumber,
i.state as Status,
i.invoice_date as InvoiceDate,
i.due_date as DueDate,
i.IDENTITY as CustomerNumber,
i.delivery_address_id as CustomerSequence,
i.currency as CurrencyCode, 
i.po_ref_number as PONumber,
i.pay_term_id as TermsCode,
ci.name as BTName, 
bt.address1 as BTAddress1, 
bt.address2 as BTAddress2,
bt.city as BTCity,
bt.state as BTState,
bt.zip_code as BTZipCode,
bt.country_db as BTCountry,
st.name as STName,
st.address1 as STAddress1, 
st.address2 as STAddress2,
st.city as STCity,
st.state as STState,
st.zip_code as STZipCode,
st.country_db as STCountry,
net_curr_amount as ProductTotal,
vat_curr_amount as SalesTax,
net_curr_amount + vat_curr_amount as InvoiceTotal,
inv_actual_net_curr_amt as InvoiceBalance,
CASE when inv_actual_net_curr_amt = 0 then 0 else 1 END as IsOpen
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
invoice i join
customer_info ci on ci.customer_id = i.identity join
customer_info_address bt on bt.customer_id = i.identity and bt.address_id = i.invoice_address_id left join
customer_info_address st on st.customer_id = i.identity and st.address_id = i.delivery_address_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
i.company  = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany} and
i.party_type_db = 'CUSTOMER' and
i.bi_timestamp > sysdate - 5

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Customer Ship To Addresses
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
ci.customer_id as CustomerNumber,
cia.address_id as CustomerSequence,
ci.name as CompanyName,
cia.Address1 as Address1,
cia.Address2 as Address2,
cia.City as City,
cia.state as State,
cia.country_db as Country,
cia.zip_code as PostalCode,
ciccp.email as Email,
ciccp.Phone as Phone,
ciccp.fax as Fax,
iii.pay_term_id as PaymentTerms,
iii.currency_code as Currency,
nvl(coce.salesman_code,'') as PrimarySalesRep,
cocae.ship_via_code as ShipVia,
cocae.delivery_terms as DeliveryTerms,
CASE WHEN (cia.valid_to is null or cia.valid_to > sysdate) and (cia.valid_from is null or cia.valid_from < sysdate) then '1' else '0' END as IsActive
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer_info ci
join customer_info_address cia on ci.customer_id = cia.customer_id and ci.one_time_db = 'FALSE'
join customer_info_address_type ciat on cia.customer_id = ciat.customer_id and ciat.address_id = cia.address_id and ciat.address_type_code_db = 'DELIVERY' 
join identity_invoice_info iii on ci.customer_id = iii.identity and iii.party_type_db = 'CUSTOMER'
join cust_ord_customer_ent coce on coce.customer_id = ci.customer_id
left join customer_info_contact_crm_pub ciccp on ci.customer_id = ciccp.customer_id and ciccp.customer_primary = 'TRUE'
left join cust_ord_customer_address_ent cocae on cocae.customer_id = cia.customer_id and cocae.address_id = cia.address_id

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: BillTo Customers
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
ci.customer_id as CustomerNumber,
cia.address_id as CustomerSequence,
ci.name as CompanyName,
cia.Address1 as Address1,
cia.Address2 as Address2,
cia.City as City,
cia.state as State,
cia.country_db as Country,
cia.zip_code as PostalCode,
ciccp.email as Email,
ciccp.Phone as Phone,
ciccp.fax as Fax,
iii.pay_term_id as PaymentTerms,
iii.currency_code as Currency,
ci.customer_id as TaxCode1,
nvl(coce.salesman_code,'') as PrimarySalesRep,
cocae.ship_via_code as ShipVia,
cocae.delivery_terms as DeliveryTerms,
CASE WHEN coce.date_del is null or coce.date_del > sysdate then '1' else '0' END as IsActive,
aging1,aging2,aging3,aging4,aging5 + aging6 as aging5
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
customer_info ci
join customer_info_address cia on ci.customer_id = cia.customer_id and ci.one_time_db = 'FALSE'
join customer_info_address_type ciat on cia.customer_id = ciat.customer_id and ciat.address_id = cia.address_id and ciat.address_type_code_db = 'PAY' and ciat.def_address = 'TRUE'
join identity_invoice_info iii on ci.customer_id = iii.identity and iii.party_type_db = 'CUSTOMER' 
join cust_ord_customer_ent coce on coce.customer_id = ci.customer_id
left join customer_info_contact_crm_pub ciccp on ci.customer_id = ciccp.customer_id and ciccp.customer_primary = 'TRUE'
left join cust_ord_customer_address_ent cocae on cocae.customer_id = cia.customer_id and cocae.address_id = cia.address_id
left join credit_collection_info cci on cci.company = iii.company and cci.identity = iii.customer_id

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Products
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
distinct
catalog_no as ERPNumber,
case when (substr(catalog_no,length(catalog_no),1) = '*') then concat(catalog_no,'_') else catalog_no end as URL,
catalog_desc as Description,
sales_unit_meas as UOM,
list_price as ListPrice,
catalog_group as ProductCode,
nvl(tax_class_id,'') as TaxClass,
cost as UnitCost,
nvl(minimum_qty,0) as MinQty,
nvl(replacement_part_no,'') as ReplacementPart,
nvl(mfg.manu_part_no,'') as ManufacturerPartNumber,
cat.storage_weight_requirement as Weight,
cat.storage_depth_requirement as Length,
cat.storage_width_requirement as Width,
cat.storage_height_requirement as Height
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
sales_part
left join part_manu_part_no mfg on mfg.part_no = sales_part.part_no
left join part_catalog_invent_attrib cat on cat.part_no = sales_part.part_no
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
contract in (select contract from site where company = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany})
and activeind_db = 'Y' and catalog_type_db = 'INV'

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Customer/Product
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
spcr.catalog_no as ProductNumber, 
spcr.customer_no as CustomerNumber,
cia.address_id as CustomerSequence,
spcr.customer_part_no as CustomerPartNumber,
spcr.customer_unit_meas as CustomerUOM
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
sales_part_cross_reference spcr
join customer_info ci on ci.customer_id = spcr.customer_no
join customer_info_address cia on cia.customer_id = ci.customer_id and ci.one_time_db = 'FALSE'
join customer_info_address_type ciat on ciat.customer_id = cia.customer_id and ciat.address_id = cia.address_id and ciat.address_type_code_db = 'PAY' and ciat.def_address = 'TRUE'
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause: contract in (select contract from site where company = {IntegrationConnector_IfsCompany})

Name: IFS Setup - Carriers/Ship Codes
Description: Optional job to run on demand to create/update shipping codes

Name: IFS01 - Sales Reps
Description: Standard IFS job for refreshing sales reps

JobDefinitionSteps.Name: Sales Reps
JobDefinitionSteps.SelectClause:
b.person_id as RepCode,
b.name as Name,
c.value as EmailAddress,
d.value as Phone
JobDefinitionSteps.FromClause:
sales_part_salesman a
join person_info b on b.person_id = a.salesman_code
left join person_info_comm_method c on c.person_id = b.person_id
left join person_info_comm_method d on d.person_id = b.person_id
JobDefinitionSteps.WhereClause:
c.method_id_db = 'E_MAIL' and c.address_id IS NULL
and d.method_id_db = 'PHONE' and d.address_id is null
and a.blocked_for_use_db = 'FALSE'
